feedback: A popular choice for its ergonomic, comfortable design and the value it delivers for the price, this tool strips and crimps wire of a range of sizes spanning the most common gauge numbers.
name: Rahim Mia

feedback: Considering the relatively low price, this wire stripper delivers surprising versatility, with its ability to strip, cut, and crimp.
name: Abdul Karim

feedback: This forged steel wire stripper delivers the quality and performance you expect from Klein Tools, along with versatile, handy capabilities, like screw and bolt shearing.
name: Abul Kalam
